properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 6 at 8:49PM EST until February 7 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow
accumulations of 5 to 8 inches with localized amounts up to 10
inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch.

* WHERE...Tioga county.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult with heavy snow, especially
during the Friday morning and midday commute. Heavy snow
combined with gusty winds will likely cause scattered power
outages.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heavy at times Friday
morning, with snowfall rates of two inches per hour possible.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST FRIDAY
